ai-atk-s0304a5:1_0: In the first terrace, the Question of the ears, etc.
ai-atk-s0304a5:2_1: they are connected with the five hindrances, who have gone to the hindrances of sensual desire,
ai-atk-s0304a5:2_2: And they were the five hindrances, the five hindrances appeared in him.
ai-atk-s0304a5:2_4: Seeing him, he said, “Don’t be negligent.”
ai-atk-s0304a5:2_5: The meaning should be understood in the second jhāna, and in the case of the second jhāna, etc.,
ai-atk-s0304a5:2_6: the surrounding of the objects here is said: “Herein, what is said?”
ai-atk-s0304a5:4_0: the signless immersion of the heart, the signless immersion of the heart, and the equanimity that occurred with insight.
ai-atk-s0304a5:4_1: As they do so, their consciousness follows after the significance of insight, thus they are discovering the processes of insight.
ai-atk-s0304a5:4_2: Just as a man would cut down a tree that has been cut off the outer skin, so that the tree covershaves like a poisonous tree, having cut off the top of the snake, “Put it doesn’t come back,”
ai-atk-s0304a5:4_3: then not seeing the Licchavīs, being able to fulfill their duties,
ai-atk-s0304a5:4_4: Since this is said, “Sister, the consciousness follows after the signless consciousness.”
ai-atk-s0304a5:4_5: Without focusing on any signs, they enter and remain in the signless immersion of the heart. They enter and remain in the signless immersion of the heart. And the signless immersion of the heart, which is ... the signless immersion of the heart, having entered upon and emerged from the signless immersion of the heart.
ai-atk-s0304a5:6_2: overcoming that association they will endure.
ai-atk-s0304a5:7_0: The Linked Discourses on Moggallāna is finished.
